name: Dungeon Boss: Respawned
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Battle. Explore. Defend. Summon a crew of mighty heroes to guard your dungeons, steal treasure and fight foes. Ready to prove who's boss?

Assemble a team of warriors, goblins and other mighty heroes to embark on an epic adventure across fantasy lands in this turn-based strategy RPG.

Features:

• Explore a fantasy world full of battlegrounds and treachery in your quest to defeat the toughest enemies in the land!
• Call upon warriors, goblins, ninja assassins, majestic knights and enchanted beasts to create the ultimate battle squad.
• Swap out skins and weapons to give your heroes fresh styles and skills.
• Collect heroes and assemble your dream team to guard against epic boss battles!
• Dive into the storylines of your favorite heroes and collect tokens to summon new heroes!
• Boost your battles by summoning a friend’s best hero to help crush your enemies.
• Reap riches in evolving daily quests!
• Earn rare loot and hone your skills in the Tower of Pwnage.
• Learn new strategies by watching replays of PvP dungeon arena battles.
• Band together in Guild play to conquer the biggest of event challenges!

- Developed by Boss Fight, a Netflix Game Studio.
